name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  test-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    # Deploy to Azure VM
    - name: Deploy to Azure VM
      uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
      with:
        host: ${{ secrets.AZURE_VM_IP }}
        username: malik
        key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}
        script: |
        sudo su -
        git pull
        cd /home/malik/Service_Web/Micro_Services/BookService
        dotnet publish -o /home/malik/IZZIBOOKS/BookService

        cd /home/malik/Service_Web/Micro_Services/UserService
        dotnet publish -o /home/malik/IZZIBOOKS/UserService
        
        cd /home/malik/Service_Web/Micro_Services/GatewayService
        dotnet publish -o /home/malik/IZZIBOOKS/GatewayService
        
        cd /home/malik/Service_Web/Micro_Services/Front
        dotnet publish -o /home/malik/IZZIBOOKS/Front
        
        sudo systemctl restart bookservice.service
        sudo systemctl restart userservice.service
        sudo systemctl restart gatewayservice.service
        sudo systemctl restart front.service
